themes: Staff accountability for past program failures
Role of public benefit in arts funding
Partnerships with arts nonprofits for sustainability
Balancing artist support with public service
key_phrases: if the staff that wrecked the programs is still there, change will be hard
AIPP in particular needs an overhaul

the City should not serve artists, but by partnering with arts nonprofits, you can sustain and grow jobs for artists while making sure the public has the arts events, classes and exhibits needed for a vibrant, well rounded arts scene
Glad to see you mention the public, as that is the key
barriers_identified: Staff responsible for previous program failures remain in place
solutions_proposed: Partner with arts nonprofits to sustain and grow jobs for artists while ensuring public access to arts events, classes, and exhibits
